telehealthList.Health Plan Nurse Advice Line: Chinese Community Health Plan encourages members to check with their medical provider or care team to see if phone or video visits are an option for their visit.

Community Care Health members have two options for telehealth services. Members can receive telehealth services through Community Medical Providers, which is a local medical group that is part of Sante Community Physicians IPA.  In addition, Community Care Health members can access telehealth services through Teladoc by completing the online registration process or downloading the Teledoc app and completing the registration process.
